mapper.select: SELECT `id`,`softwareName`,`APKName`,`softwareSize`,`downloads`, (SELECT `valueName` FROM `data_dictionary` WHERE `typeName`='所属平台' AND `valueId`=p.`flatformId`) AS '所属平台', (SELECT `categoryName` FROM `app_category` WHERE `id`=p.`categoryLevel1`) AS '一级分类', (SELECT `categoryName` FROM `app_category` WHERE `id`=p.`categoryLevel2`) AS '二级分类', (SELECT `categoryName` FROM `app_category` WHERE `id`=p.`categoryLevel3`) AS '三级分类', (SELECT `valueName` FROM `data_dictionary` WHERE `typeName`='APP状态' AND `valueId`=p.`status`) AS '软件状态', (SELECT `versionNo` FROM `app_version` WHERE `id`=p.`versionId`) AS '最新版本号' FROM `app_info` p
